document.full_text: dallas mavericks back-up center brendan haywood will miss sunday's game three of the nba finals against the miami heat with a strained right hip flexor, coach rick carlisle said.
document.title: mavericks' haywood out for game three against miami
lines_and_colors: dallas mavericks back-up center brendan haywood will miss sunday's game three of the nba finals against the miami heat with a strained right hip flexor, coach rick carlisle said.
